content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src 'self' https://easydrivingdirections.com; script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; img-src 'self' https://www.google.co.in https://www.google.com https://googleads.g.doubleclick.net https://www.googleadservices.com https://easydrivingdirections.com * data:;  frame-src 'self' https://easydrivingdirections.com * data:;
